title: Matlab r2014a  [ OSX / Linux ]
description:
Mavericks compatible

x64 only  ~  feel free to patch the x86 versions or either libmwservices.so/libmwservices.dylib if you like   ....:-)

1) Replace install.jar on the install disc/image with the one provided. How you do that is up to you... copy the entire disc to folder and overwrite install.jar ( in the java folder) or use an ISO    editor like UltraISO to edit the image directly.  This is same as the windoze version , in that the install.jar is modified to allow the key provided to install all toolboxes.

2) Mount Matlab 2014a UNIX disc and run the appropriate installer for either Linux(UNIX) or MAC OS X


3) choose "install manually without using the internet"		

4) when prompted to enter the "file installation key" use
    12345-67890-12345-67890

5) pick the toolboxes you want to install ( they should all be avalible)

6) select activation without internet and use "license_405329_R2014a.lic" as license file.

For:

Linux   Copy/overwrite libmwservices.so ( from the linux folder provided ) to : /usr/local/MATLAB/R2014A/bin/glnxa64.. ( or where ever you have installed MATLAB .. this path would be from Ubuntu for example) As you're using linux, I don't have to explain user owned files vs root owned files ... right ?

MAC OS X   Copy/overwrite libmwservices.dylib ( from the MAC OS X folder provided) to : MATLAB_R2014a.appbinmaci64
